casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 4, 2011

[Cite as 03/04/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-953.]

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2010-2078. State ex rel. Lutz v. Brilliant Water & Sewer Dist. Bd. of Trustees.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus.

Upon consideration of the joint application for dismissal, it is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.
